item.title: dropHandler.java?
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

I need something like my title says to handle drops.cfg (global items). Or can someone help me with this code because when I try to add more in here I don’t get errors but I disconnect when it spawns.

[code=java]import java.io.*;//credits to xero for handler
public class GlobalItems
{
public int spawntimer = 0;

public void LoadItems()
{
for (int i = 0; i <= 5000; i++){
if(spawntimer <= 1)
{
//ITEMID, COORDX, COORDY, AMOUNT - Jdog
ItemHandler.addItem(995, 3091, 3495, 500, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // coins on table edgevile
spawntimer = 10;
}
}
}
public void process()
{
LoadItems();
spawntimer -= 1;
}
}[/code]

Read full topic
